column4: Is there a way to make Rhythmbox media player to default to alsa?
Anything that does sound complains about device not being free.
wget :D
lynx isn't a default installed package, so its better to tell the noob to use wget
Gutsy is not so unstable :P
Do you need to dfrag with linux?
i don't know what you mean with auto mouse.
But my scroll mouse has been working since feisty.
i mean a simpler gui config for multi-button mice
is that the Preference->Mouse thing?
yes but with options to configure the mouse buttons
not mine. Maybe it is still in dev.
On the whole, Gutsy installs for me in under 20 mins of my life.
Compared to the feisty of 30+ mins.
too bad i think gutsy could really use a simpler mouse config
i don't think that simpler than this would be any good.
only thing is forward/back buttons, really could use those argh
ah you have that kind of "web" mouse.
yea and i agree half the buttons on the mouse i dont bother with, but the forward/back really are quite handy
mehdi, could do that too i spose
i would say so. I hate to leave the mouse when i am concentrated reading stuff on the web.
